data.message: Is anyone else having problems with the Facebook app on their phones? For about a week now it hasn't worked for me. I deleted it. Very frustrated to not have it operational.

replies.message: Hey Carly. If you are running the latest version of iOS and are still unable to update your Facebook Mobile app through the App Store, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/18dEFaD -Hailey
you can delete it??????? i want to delete it. but it comes installed in the phone already
I have the iPhone 4S, in perfect condition. The app is deletable. I have a feeling the last update I installed made it not work. Maybe it's not compatible with "older" phones anymore?
